topic.title: Migrating to Couchbase Server
topic.shortdesc: This section explains how to migrate from Membase or CouchDB to Couchbase Server.

body.p: Couchbase Server is based on components from both Membase Server and CouchDB.
If you are a user of these database systems, or are migrating from them to Couchbase Server, the following information can help in translating your understanding of the main concepts and terms.
